_sText:
This is the final version of my long going zm_pitch map. After 4 betas I've finally released something I'm happy with.

<blink><font color= red>Note:</blink> </font> This is my first attempt at using HRD. It's not very noticeable, read below for more info
<hr>
Change log is as follows....

Quick Notes. Thanks to everyone for testing my maps and encouraging me. Pitch now has HDR, it's my first time working with HDR so I made it less intense compared to other maps. Also the pictures in Church glow bright white, sorry.

zm_pitch (final version Max players <font color= red>64</font>)
	
	-Optimized- runs faster
	-Max players increased from 40 to 64
	-Added HDR
	-Lessened custom textures, should be smaller to download now
	-Church chairs don't "push" players away
	-Altered Church rafters
	-Blocked area under boxes, house across from Church
	-Most barricad-able and hiding areas have been improved
